question: Where is the Institute of Liver and Biliary Sciences located?
explanation:
The Institute of Liver and Biliary Sciences (ILBS) is an autonomous Institute established by the Government of Delhi. It is super-speciality hospital for liver and biliary diseases located at New Delhi. It has also been given the status of University by the University Grants Commission.
Recently, the President of India, Ram Nath Kovind, attended and addressed the tenth foundation day of the Institute of Liver and Biliary Sciences (ILBS) in New Delhi. He suggested to establish liver transplant programs in more public hospitals across the country and to spread awareness about organ donation.
